message.content: {"id": "4971", "title": "Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'", "description": "Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' in jdt.ui, the package 'ui' is included in the resulting package 'xx'. The expected behavior should be that the resulting package is 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.", "OB": "The resulting package 'xx' contains a package called 'ui'.", "EB": "The resulting package should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.", "SR": "To fix this issue, ensure that the 'copy package' operation in jdt.ui correctly creates the resulting package as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of including the 'ui' package."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '4971', 'title': "Bug 4971Strange 'copy package'", 'description': "Bug 4971Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5. ", 'OB': "As result, xx contains a package 'ui'. ", 'EB': "Shouldbe 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' ", 'SR': ''}
